description: A group of journalists tried to stage single-person pickets in support of a jailed colleague.
title: Russian outcry as journalists held during Ilya Azar protest
title_page: Russian outcry as journalists held during Ilya Azar protest - BBC News
maintext: Moscow has been at the heart of the epidemic and is still under lockdown. Mayor Sergei Sobyanin said some of the restrictions would be eased on 1 June, enabling residents to leave their homes for regular walks and leisure activities.
